vote.title: Authorize a decrease in the construction services contract with Vescorp Construction, LLC dba Chavez Concrete Cutting by reducing the Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery and Community Development Block Grant capacity - Not to exceed $3,031,696.07, from $13,887,150.00 to $10,855,453.93 - Financing:  Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds ($2,031,696.07) and Community Development Block Grant Fund ($1,000,000.00)
